data.thought: S41|H|S40|Hybrid Phenotype H1: 'Self-Improving Documentation System'. Combines: Swarm (A5 stigmergy) + Meta (D2 optimizer) + Multi-system (C2 research). Multiple notebooks: (1) Crawl codebase, generate docs (2) Analyze doc quality, identify gaps (3) Research best practices, compare (4) Improve doc generation (5) Track reader behavior, optimize for comprehension. Observable: doc quality metrics over time, improvement lineage. Emergent: docs that get better without human intervention.
